meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foamy.
meanings.sent1: The foaminess of the bubble bath made it fun to play with.
meanings.sent2: I love the foaminess of my cappuccino in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The foaminess of the soap made washing dishes feel like a party.
meanings.sent4: The foaminess of the ocean waves reminded me of a giant bubble bath.
meanings.sent5: The foaminess of the milk in the latte was like a fluffy cloud in my cup.
